org.elasticsearch.action.bulk

Class Retry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.action.bulk.Retry

  • public class Retry
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates synchronous and asynchronous retry logic.

      • withAsyncBackoff

        public void withAsyncBackoff(Client client,
                             BulkRequest bulkRequest,
                             ActionListener<BulkResponse> listener)
        Invokes #bulk(BulkRequest, ActionListener) on the provided client. Backs off on the provided exception and delegates results to the provided listener.
        Parameters:
        client - Client invoking the bulk request.
        bulkRequest - The bulk request that should be executed.
        listener - A listener that is invoked when the bulk request finishes or completes with an exception. The listener is not

      • withSyncBackoff

        public BulkResponse withSyncBackoff(Client client,
                                    BulkRequest bulkRequest)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Invokes #bulk(BulkRequest) on the provided client. Backs off on the provided exception.
        Parameters:
        client - Client invoking the bulk request.
        bulkRequest - The bulk request that should be executed.
        Returns:
        the bulk response as returned by the client.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any exception thrown by the callable.
